lines.gurmukhi: 1 mMglw crx
lines.transliteration_english: Ikonkaar Satigur Prasaadi ?

Shabad OS B.translation: One Oankar, the primal energy, realized through the grace of divine preceptor

lines.gurmukhi: iek kvwau pswau kir EAMkwr Anyk Akwrw
lines.transliteration_english: Ik Kavaau Pasaau Kari Aoankaar Anayk Akaaraa.

Shabad OS B.translation: By one bang, the Oankar created and spread myriad of forms.

lines.gurmukhi: pauxu pwxI bYsMqro Driq Agwis invwsu ivQwrw
lines.transliteration_english: Paounu Paanee Baysantaro Dharati Agaasi Nivaasu Vidaaraa.

Shabad OS B.translation: He extended His self in the form of air, water, fire, earth and sky etc.

lines.gurmukhi: jl Ql qrvr prbqwN jIA jMq Agxq Apwrw
lines.transliteration_english: Jal Dal Taravar Parabataan Jeea Jant Aganat Apaaraa.

Shabad OS B.translation: He created water, land, trees, mountains and many biotic communities.

lines.gurmukhi: ieku vrBMfu AKMfu hY lK vrBMf plk plkwrw
lines.transliteration_english: Iku Varabhandu Akhandu Hai Lakh Varabhand Palak Parakaaraa.

Shabad OS B.translation: That supreme creator Himself is indivisible and in one wink of an eye can create millions of universes.

lines.gurmukhi: kudriq kIm n jwxIAY kyvfu kwdru isrjxhwrw
lines.transliteration_english: Kudarati Keem N Jaaneeai Kayvadu Kaadaru Sirajanahaaraa.

Shabad OS B.translation: When boundaries of His creation are unknowable, how can the expanse of that Creator be known?

lines.gurmukhi: AMqu ibAMq n pwrwvwrw ]1]
lines.transliteration_english: Antu Biantu N Paaraavaaraa ?1?

Shabad OS B.translation: No end is there of His extremes; they are infinite.

lines.gurmukhi: 2 Eho hI

Shabad OS B.translation: Invocation

lines.gurmukhi: kyvfu vfw AwKIAY vfy dI vfI vifAweI
lines.transliteration_english: Kayvadu Vadaa Aakheeai Vaday Dee Vadee Vadiaaee.

Shabad OS B.translation: How vast could He be said? The grandeur of the Great is great.

lines.gurmukhi: vfI hU vfw AwKIAY suix suix AwKxu AwK suxweI
lines.transliteration_english: Vadee Hoon Vadaa Vakhaaneeai Souni Souni Aakhanu Aakh Sounaaee.

Shabad OS B.translation: I relate what I have heard that He is said to be the greatest of the great.

lines.gurmukhi: rom rom ivic riKEnu kir vrBMf kroV smweI
lines.transliteration_english: Rom Rom Vichi Rakhiaonu Kari Varabhand Karorhi Samaaee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Crores of universes reside in His trichome.

lines.gurmukhi: ieku kvwau pswau ijsu qoil Aqolu n quil qulweI
lines.transliteration_english: Iku Kavaau Pasaau Jisu Toli Atolu N Tuli Tulaaee.

Shabad OS B.translation: None could be compared with Him Who created and spread everything with one bang.

lines.gurmukhi: vyd kqybhu bwhrw AkQ khwxI kQI n jweI
lines.transliteration_english: Vayd Kataybahu Baaharaa Akad Kahaanee Kadee N Jaaee.

Shabad OS B.translation: He is beyond all the statements of the Vedas and the Katebas. His ineffable story is beyond all descriptions.

lines.gurmukhi: Aibgiq giq ikv AlK lKweI ]2]
lines.transliteration_english: Abigati Gati Kiv Alakhu Lakhaaee ?2?

Shabad OS B.translation: How could His unmanifest dynamism by seen and understood?

lines.gurmukhi: 3 kudrq iv`c kwrIgrI hY

Shabad OS B.translation: Craftsmanship is there in the creation

lines.gurmukhi: jIau pwie qnu swijAw muhu AKI nku kMn svwry
lines.transliteration_english: Jeeu Paai Tanu Saajiaa Muhu Akhee Naku Kann Savaaray.

Shabad OS B.translation: Creating the jiva (self) He made his body and gave good shape to his mouth, nose, eyes and ears.

lines.gurmukhi: hQ pYr dy dwiq kir sbd suriq suB idsit duAwry
lines.transliteration_english: Had Pair Day Daati Kari Sabad Surati Soubh Disati Duaaray.

Shabad OS B.translation: Gracefully He bestowed hands and feet, ears and consciousness for listening to the Word and eye for beholding goodness.

lines.gurmukhi: ikriq ivriq prikriq bhu swis igrwis invwsu sMjwry
lines.transliteration_english: Kirati Virati Par Kirati Bahu Saasi Giraasi Nivaasu Sanjaaray.

Shabad OS B.translation: For earning of the livelihood and other works, he infused life into body.

lines.gurmukhi: rwg rMg rs prsdy gMD sugMD sMiD prkwry
lines.transliteration_english: Raag Rang Ras Parasaday Gandh Sougandh Sandhi Parakaaray.

Shabad OS B.translation: He bestowed various techniques of assimilation of music, colours, smells and fragrances.

lines.gurmukhi: Cwdn Bojn buiD blu tyk ibbyk vIcwr vIcwry
lines.transliteration_english: Chhaadan Bhojan Budhi Balu Tayk Bibayk Veechaar Veechaaray.

Shabad OS B.translation: For clothing and eating He gave wisdom, power, devotion, and discriminatory wisdom and thought process.

lines.gurmukhi: dwny kImiq nw pvY bysumwr dwqwr ipAwry
lines.transliteration_english: Daanay Keemati Naa Pavai Baysoumaar Daataar Piaaray.

Shabad OS B.translation: The mysteries of that Bestower cannot be understood; that loving Donor keeps with Him myriad's of virtues.

lines.gurmukhi: lyK AlyK AsMK Apwry ]3]
lines.transliteration_english: Laykh Alaykh Asankh Apaaray ?3?

Shabad OS B.translation: Beyond all accounts, He is infinite and unfathomable.

lines.gurmukhi: 4 kudrq lyKy ivc hY

Shabad OS B.translation: The creation is accountable

lines.gurmukhi: pMj qqu prvwxu kir KwxI cwir jgq aupwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Panji Tatu Paravaanu Kari Khaanee Chaari Jagatu Oupaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Mixing the five elements from four (life) mines (egg, foetus, sweat, vegetation) the whole world was created.

lines.gurmukhi: lK caurwsI jUin ivc Awvwgvx clqu vrqwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Lakh Chauraaseeh Jooni Vichi Aavaagavan Chalatu Varataaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Creating the eighty-four lakhs speicies of life, the feat of transmigration has been accomplished in them.

lines.gurmukhi: ieks ieks jUin ivic jIA jMq Axgxq vDwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Ikas Ikas Jooni Vichi Jeea Jant Anaganat Vadhaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: In each one of the species many a creature has been produced.

lines.gurmukhi: lyKY AMdir sB ko sBnw msqik lyKu ilKwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Laykhai Andari Sabh Ko Sabhanaa Masataki Laykhu Likhaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: All are responsible (for their actions) and carry writ of fate on their forehead.

lines.gurmukhi: lyKY sws igrws dy lyK ilKwrI AMqu n pwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Laykhai Saas Giraas Day Laykh Likhaaree Antu N Paaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Every breath and morsel is counted. Mystery of writs and that Writer could not be known by any one.

lines.gurmukhi: Awp AlyKu n AlK lKwieAw ]4]
lines.transliteration_english: Aapi Alaykhu N Alakhu Lakhaaiaa ?4?

Shabad OS B.translation: Himself imperceptible, He is beyond all writs.

lines.gurmukhi: 5 kudrq BY ivc hY

Shabad OS B.translation: Creation is in fear

lines.gurmukhi: BY ivic Driq Awgwsu hY inrwDwr BY Bwr DrwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Bhai Vichi Dharati Agaasu Hai Niraadhaar Bhai Bhaari Dharaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Earth and sky are in fear but not held by any support, and, that Lord sustains them under the weight of fears.

lines.gurmukhi: pauxu pwxI bYsMqro BY ivic rKY myil imlwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Paounu Paanee Baisantaro Bhai Vichi Rakhai Mayli Milaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Keeping air, water and fire in fear (discipline). He has mixed them all (and has created the world).

lines.gurmukhi: pwxI AMdir Driq Dir ivxu QMmHw Awgwsu rhwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Paanee Andari Dharati Dhari Vinu Danmaa Aagaasu Rahaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Setting earth in water He has established sky without the support of any props.

lines.gurmukhi: kwTY AMdir Agin Dir kr prPulqu suPl PlwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Kaatdai Andari Agani Dhari Kari Paraphulit Suphalu Phalaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: He kept fire in wood and loading the trees with flowers and fruits made them meaningful.

lines.gurmukhi: nvI duAwrI pvxu Dir BY ivic sUrju cMd clwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Navee Duaaree Pavanu Dhari Bhai Vichi Sooraju Chand Chalaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Keeping air (life) in all the nine doors He made the sun and the moon to move in fear (discipline).

lines.gurmukhi: inrBau Awip inrMjnu rwieAw ]5]
lines.transliteration_english: Nirabhau Aapi Niranjanu Raaiaa ?5?

Shabad OS B.translation: That spotless Lord Himself is beyond all fears.

lines.gurmukhi: 6 kwdr byEVk pr vRXwpk hY

Shabad OS B.translation: Creator is infinite and omnipresent

lines.gurmukhi: lK Asmwx aucwix ciV aucw hoie n AMbiV skY
lines.transliteration_english: Lakh Asamaan Ouchaani Charhi Ouchaa Hoi N Anbarhi Sakai.

Shabad OS B.translation: Even mounting the lakhs of sky none can reach that highest Lord.

lines.gurmukhi: aucI hU aUcw Gxw Qwau igrwau n nwau AQkY
lines.transliteration_english: Ouchee Hoon Oochaa Ghanaa Daau Giraau N Naau Adakai.

Shabad OS B.translation: He is higher than the highest; He has no (particular) place, residence, name and any fatigue.

lines.gurmukhi: lK pqwl nIvwix jwie nIvw hoie n nIvY qkY
lines.transliteration_english: Lakh Pataal Neevaani Jaai Neevaa Hoi N Neevai Takai.

Shabad OS B.translation: If someone goes low equal to millions of netherworlds even then he cannot behold Him.

lines.gurmukhi: pUrib pCim auqrwiD dKix Pyir cauPyir n FkY
lines.transliteration_english: Poorabi Pachhami Outaraadhi Dakhani Dhayri Chaudhayri N Ddhakai.

Shabad OS B.translation: Even the covers of all the four directions - north, east, south, west, cannot over Him.

lines.gurmukhi: EVk mUlu n lBeI auqpiq prlau AiK PrkY
lines.transliteration_english: Aorhak Moolu N Labhaee Aopati Paralau Akhi Dharakai.

Shabad OS B.translation: His expanse cannot be attained; He by one wink of His eye can create and dissolute (the whole cosmos).

lines.gurmukhi: Pulw AMdir vws mhkY ]6]
lines.transliteration_english: Phulaan Andari Vaasu Mahakai ?6?

Shabad OS B.translation: As the fragrance adorns the flower, the Lord also is present everywhere.

lines.gurmukhi: 7 kudrq dw Byq kwdr jwxdw hY

Shabad OS B.translation: Only Creator knows the mystery of creation

lines.gurmukhi: EAMkwir Akwru kir iQiq n vwru n mwhu jxwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Aoankaari Akaaru Kari Diti Vaaru N Maahu Janaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: About the day and month of the creation, the Creator has told nothing to anybody.

lines.gurmukhi: inrMkwr Awkwru ivxu eykMkwru n AlKu lKwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Nirankaaru Aakaaru Vinu Aykankaar N Alakhu Lakhaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: The Formless One who resided in His own self did not make anybody see His imperceptible form.

lines.gurmukhi: Awpy Awip aupwie kY Awpy Awpxw nwauN DrwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Aapay Aapi Oupaai Kai Aapay Apanaa Naau Dharaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Himself He created all and Himself He (for the weal of creatures) established His name in their hearts.

lines.gurmukhi: Awid purKu Awdysu hY hY BI hosI hoNdw AwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Aadi Purakhu Aadaysu Hai Hai Bhee Hosee Hondaa Aaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: I bow before that primal Lord, who is there in the present, who will remain in the future and who was in the beginning as well.

lines.gurmukhi: Awid n AMqu ibAMqu hY Awp Awip n Awpu gxwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Aadi N Antu Biantu Hai Aapay Aapi N Aapu Ganaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: He is beyond beginning, beyond end and is infinite; but He never makes Himself noticed.

lines.gurmukhi: Awpy Awpu aupwie smwieAw ]7]
lines.transliteration_english: Aapay Aapu Oupaai Samaaiaa ?7?

Shabad OS B.translation: He created the world and Himself subsumes it in His self.

lines.gurmukhi: 8 kwdr kIqy qoN AgMm hY

Shabad OS B.translation: The Creator is inaccessible for the creation

lines.gurmukhi: rom rom ivic riKEnu kir vrBMf kroiV smweI
lines.transliteration_english: Rom Rom Vichi Rakhiaonu Kari Varabhand Karorhi Samaaee.

Shabad OS B.translation: In His one trichome He has subsumed crores of universes.

lines.gurmukhi: kyvfu vfw AwKIAY ikqu Gir vsY kyvfu jweI
lines.transliteration_english: Kayvadu Vadaa Aakheeai Kitu Ghari Vasai Kayvadu Jaaee.

Shabad OS B.translation: What can be said about His expanse, His abode and the extent of His place?

lines.gurmukhi: ieku kvwau Amwau hY lK drIAwau n kImiq pweI
lines.transliteration_english: Iku Kavaau Amaau Hai Lakh Dareeaau N Keemati Paaee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Even His one sentence is beyond all limits and its evaluation cannot be done by millions of rivers of knowledge.

lines.gurmukhi: prvdgwru Apwru hY pwrwvwru n AlKu lKweI
lines.transliteration_english: Paravadagaaru Apaaru Hai Paaraavaaru N Alakhu Lakhaaee.

Shabad OS B.translation: That sustainer of the world is inaccessible; his beginning and end is imperceptible.

lines.gurmukhi: eyvfu vfw hoie kY ikQY rihAw Awpu lukweI
lines.transliteration_english: Ayvadu Vadaa Hoi Kai Kidai Rahiaa Aapu Loukaaee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Being so much great where has He hidden Himself?

lines.gurmukhi: sur nr nwQ rhy ilv lweI ]8]
lines.transliteration_english: Sur Nar Naad Rahay Liv Laaee ?8?

Shabad OS B.translation: To know this, the gods, men and many a nath are ever in concentration upon Him.

lines.gurmukhi: 9 kwdr kIqy qoN AgMm hY

Shabad OS B.translation: The Creator is inaccessible for the creation

lines.gurmukhi: lK drIAwau kvwau ivic Aiq Asgwh AQwh vhMdy
lines.transliteration_english: Lakh Dareeaau Kavaau Vichi Ati Asagaah Adaah Vahanday.

Shabad OS B.translation: In His will lakhs of deep and unfathomable rivers (of life) go on flowing.

lines.gurmukhi: Awid n AMqu ibAMqu hY Agm Agocr Pyr iPrMdy
lines.transliteration_english: Aadi N Antu Biantu Hai Agam Agochar Dhayr Dhiranday.

Shabad OS B.translation: Beginning and end of those life currents cannot be understood.

lines.gurmukhi: AlKu Apwru vKwxIAY pwrwvwru n pwr lhMdy
lines.transliteration_english: Alakhu Apaaru Vakhaaneeai Paaraavaaru N Paar Lahanday.

Shabad OS B.translation: They are infinite, inaccessible and imperceptible but still all move in the Lord, the great. They cannot know the extent of that imperceptible and boundless Lord.

lines.gurmukhi: lhir qrMg insMg lK swgr sMgm rMg rvMdy
lines.transliteration_english: Lahari Tarang Nisang Lakh Saagar Sangam Rang Ravanday.

Shabad OS B.translation: Rivers having myriad's of waves meeting the ocean becomes one with it.

lines.gurmukhi: rqn pdwrQ lK lK muil Amuil n quil qulMdy
lines.transliteration_english: Ratan Padaarad Lakh Lakh Muli Amuli N Tuli Tuladay.

Shabad OS B.translation: In that ocean are lakhs of invaluable jewel materials, which in fact are beyond all costing.

lines.gurmukhi: sdky isrjxhwir isrMdy ]9]
lines.transliteration_english: Sadakay Sirajanahaari Siranday ?9?

Shabad OS B.translation: I am sacrifice unto that Creator Lord.

lines.gurmukhi: 10 kwdr inrlyp qy pUrn hY

Shabad OS B.translation: The Creator is detached and perfect

lines.gurmukhi: prvdgwru slwhIAY isriT aupweI rMg ibrMgI
lines.transliteration_english: Paravadagaaru Salaaheeai Siratdi Oupaaee Rang Birangee.

Shabad OS B.translation: That sustainer Lord ought to be praised who has created the multicoloured creation.

lines.gurmukhi: rwijku irjku sbwihdw sBnw dwiq kry AxmMgI
lines.transliteration_english: Raajiku Rijaku Sabaahidaa Sabhanaa Daati Karay Anamangee.

Shabad OS B.translation: He is bestower of livelihood to everyone and giver of charity unasked for.

lines.gurmukhi: iksY ijvyhw nwih ko duibDw AMdir mMdI cMgI
lines.transliteration_english: Kisai Jivayhaa Naahi Ko Doubidhaa Andari Mandee Changee.

Shabad OS B.translation: None resembles anyone and the jiva (creative) is good or bad according to the ratio of perplexity in him.

lines.gurmukhi: pwrbHm inrlypu hY pUrnu bHmu sdw shlMgI
lines.transliteration_english: Paarabrahamu Niralaypu Hai Pooranu Brahamu Sadaa Sahalagee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Being transcendent, He is detached from every thing and being perfect Brahm. He is always with everybody.

lines.gurmukhi: vrnw ichnw bwhrw sBnw AMdir hY srbMgI
lines.transliteration_english: Varanaan Chihanaan Baaharaan Sabhanaa Andari Hai Sarabangee.

Shabad OS B.translation: He is beyond caste and symbols etc. but side by side He pervades one and all.

lines.gurmukhi: pauxu pwxI bYsMqru sMgI ]10]
lines.transliteration_english: Paounu Paanee Baisantaru Sangee ?10?

Shabad OS B.translation: He is in air, water and fire i.e. He is the power of these elements.

lines.gurmukhi: 11 mwXk auqpqI kwrx

Shabad OS B.translation: Reasons for the creation of maya

lines.gurmukhi: EAMkwir Awkwru kir mKI iek aupweI mwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Aoankaari Aakaaru Kari Makhee Ik Oupaaee Maaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: The Oankar creating the forms created a fly named maya.

lines.gurmukhi: iqin loA caudh Bvxu jl Qlu mhIAlu Clu kir CwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Tini Loa Chaudah Bhavanu Jal Dalu Maheealu Chhalu Kari Chhaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: It cheated profusely all the three worlds, fourteen abodes, water, surface and the nether world.

lines.gurmukhi: bHmw ibsn mhys qRY ds Avqwr bjwir ncwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Brahamaa Bisan Mahaysu Trai Das Avataar Bajaari Nachaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: All the ten incarnations, besides Brahma, Visnu, Mahesa, it made to dance in the bazar in the form of world.

lines.gurmukhi: jqI sqI sMqoKIAw isD nwQ bhu pMQ BvwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Jatee Satee Santokheeaa Sidh Naad Bahu Pand Bhavaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: The celibates, the chaste ones, the contented people, siddhas and naths all were made to move astray on the paths of various sects.

lines.gurmukhi: kwm kroD ivroD ivic loB mohu kir DRoh lVwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Kaam Karodh Virodh Vichi Lobh Mohu Kari Dhrohu Larhaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Maya infused lust, anger, opposition, greed, infatuation, and deceit in all and made them to have infightings.

lines.gurmukhi: haumY AMdir sBko syrhu Git n iknY AKwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Haoumai Andari Sabhu Ko Sayrahu Ghati N Kinai Akhaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Full of ego they are hollow from inside but none accepts himself imperfect (all feel they are the full measure and nothing less than it).

lines.gurmukhi: kwrxu krqy Awpu lukwieAw ]11]
lines.transliteration_english: Kaaranu Karatay Aapu Loukaaiaa ?11?

Shabad OS B.translation: The Creator Lord Himself has concealed the reason for all this.

lines.gurmukhi: 12 hukm

Shabad OS B.translation: Majestic orders of the emperors

lines.gurmukhi: pwiqswhwN pwiqswhu hY Abclu rwju vfI pwiqswhI
lines.transliteration_english: Paatisaahaan Paatisaahu Hai Abachalu Raaju Vadee Paatisaahee.

Shabad OS B.translation: He (the Lord) is emperor of emperors whose rule is stable and kingdom greatly large.

lines.gurmukhi: kyvfu qKqu vKwxIAY kyvfu mhlu kyvfu drgwhI
lines.transliteration_english: Kayvadu Takhatu Vakhaaneeai Kayvadu Mahalu Kayvadu Daragaahee.

Shabad OS B.translation: How big are His throne, palace and the court.

lines.gurmukhi: kyvfu isPiq slwhIAY kyvfu mwlu mulKu AvgwhI
lines.transliteration_english: Kayvadu Sidhati Salaaheeai Kayvadu Maalu Mulakhu Avagaahee.

Shabad OS B.translation: How should He be eulogised and how could be known the expanse of His treasure and territory?

lines.gurmukhi: kyvfu mwxu mhqu hY kyvfu lskr syv ispwhI
lines.transliteration_english: Kayvadu Maanu Mahatu Hai Kayvadu Lasakar Sayv Sipaahee.

Shabad OS B.translation: How great is His grandeur and magnificence and how many soldiers and armies are there in His service?

lines.gurmukhi: hukmY AMdir sB ko kyvfu hukmu n byprvwhI
lines.transliteration_english: Houkamai Andari Sabh Ko Kayvadu Houkamu N Bayparavaahee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Everything is under His order is so much organised and powerful that no carelessness is there.

lines.gurmukhi: horsu puiC n mqw inbwhI ]12]
lines.transliteration_english: Horasu Pouchhi N Mataa Nibaahee ?12?

Shabad OS B.translation: He asks none to arrange all this.

lines.gurmukhi: 13 kIqy ny krqw ivswirAw

Shabad OS B.translation: The creation forgot the creator

lines.gurmukhi: lK lK bHmy vyd pViH ieks AKr Bydu n jwqw
lines.transliteration_english: Lakh Lakh Brahamay Vayd Parhhi Ikas Akhar Bhaydu N Jaataa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Even after reading lakhs of Vedas, Brahma did not understand syllable (paramatama)

lines.gurmukhi: jog iDAwn mhys lK rUp n ryK n ByKu pCwqw
lines.transliteration_english: Jog Dhiaan Mahays Lakh Roop N Raykh N Bhaykh Pachhaataa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Siva meditates through lakhs of methods (postures) but still could not recognise the form, hue and guise (of the Lord).

lines.gurmukhi: lK Avqwr Akwr kir iqlu vIcwru n ibsn pCwqw
lines.transliteration_english: Lakh Avataar Akaar Kari Tilu Vichaar N Bisan Pachhaataa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Visnu incarnated himself through lakhs of creatures but he could not recognise even a bit of that Lord.

lines.gurmukhi: lK lK nauqn nwau lY lK lK syK ivsyK n qwqw
lines.transliteration_english: Lakh Lakh Naoutan Naau Lai Lakh Lakh Saykh Visaykh N Taataa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Sesanag (the mythical snake) recited and remembered many a new name of the Lord but still could not know much about Him.

lines.gurmukhi: icr jIvnu bhu hMFxy drsn pMQ n sbdu is\\\\wqw
lines.transliteration_english: Chiru Jeevanu Bah Handdhanay Darasan Pand N Sabadu Siaataa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Many long-lived persons experienced life variously, but they all and many a philosopher could not understand Sabda, the Brahma.

lines.gurmukhi: dwiq luBwie ivswrin dwqw ]13]
lines.transliteration_english: Daati Loubhaai Visaarani Daataa ?13?

Shabad OS B.translation: All got engrossed in the gifts of that Lord and that bestower has been forgotten.

lines.gurmukhi: 14 kIqw krqy nUM ikkUM pwvy gwfI rwh

Shabad OS B.translation: How creation could attain the Creator? The highway     ?

lines.gurmukhi: inrMkwr Awkwru kir gur mUriq huie iDAwnu DrwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Nirankaar Aakaaru Kari Gur Moorati Hoi Dhiaan Dharaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: The formless Lord assumed shape and getting established in the form of Guru made all to meditate upon Lord (here the hint is towards Guru Nanak).

lines.gurmukhi: cwir vrn gurisK kir swDsMgiq scKMfu vswieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Chaari Varan Gurasikh Kari Saadhasangati Sach Khandu Vasaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: He accepted disciples from all the four varnas and founded the abode of treuth in the form of holy congregation.

lines.gurmukhi: vyd kqybhu bwhrw AkQ kQw gur sbdu suxwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Vayd Kataybahu Baaharaa Akad Kadaa Gur Sabadu Sounaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: He explained the grandeur of that word of the Guru beyond the Vedas and the Katebas.

lines.gurmukhi: vIhw AMdir vrqmwnu gurmuiK hoie iekIh lKwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Veehaan Andari Varatamaanu Guramoukhi Hoi Ikeeh Lakhaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Those who indulged in scores of evils were now put to meditate upon the Lord.

lines.gurmukhi: mwieAw ivic audwsu kir nwmu dwnu iesnwn idVwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Maaiaa Vichi Udaasu Kari Naamu Daanu Isanaanu Dirhaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: They were kept detached amidst maya and were made to understand the importance of that holy name, charity and ablution.

lines.gurmukhi: bwrh pMQ iekqR kir gurmuiK gwfI rwhu clwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Baarah Pand Ikatr Kari Guramoukhi Gaadee Raahu Chalaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Gathering the twelve sects together, he prepared a high path of gurmukhs.

lines.gurmukhi: piq pauVI ciV inj Gir AwieAw ]14]
lines.transliteration_english: Pati Paurhee Charhi Nij Ghari Aaiaa ?14?

Shabad OS B.translation: Following that path (or order) and mounting the stairs of honour they have all stabilised in their true selves.

lines.gurmukhi: 15 gwfI rwh dy rwhI gurmuK

Shabad OS B.translation: Gurmukhs the treaders of the highway

lines.gurmukhi: gurmuiK mwrig pYr Dir duibDw vwt kuvwt n DwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Guramoukhi Maaragi Pair Dhari Doubidhaa Vaat Kuvaat N Dhaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Following the path of being gurmukh man does not read on the wrong way of uncertainty.

lines.gurmukhi: siqgur drsnu dyiKkY mrdw jwNdw ndir n AwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Satigur Darasanu Daykhi Kai Maradaa Jaandaa Nadari N Aaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: After beholding the true Guru, one does not see life, death, coming and going.

lines.gurmukhi: kMnI siqgur sbdu suix Anhd rux Juxkwr suxwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Kannee Satigur Sabadu Souni Anahad Roun Jhounakaaru Sounaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Listening to the world of true Guru he becomes attuned to the unstruck melody.

lines.gurmukhi: siqgur srxI Awie kY inhclu swDU sMig imlwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Satigur Saranee Aai Kai Nihachalu Saadhoo Sangi Milaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Coming to the shelter of the true Guru now man absorbs in the stabilising holy congregation.

lines.gurmukhi: crx kvl mkrMd ris suK sMpt ivic shij smwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Charan Kaval Makarand Rasi Soukhasanpat Vichi Sahaji Samaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: He subsumes himself in the delight of the lotus feet.

lines.gurmukhi: iprm ipAwlw Aipau pIAwieAw ]15]
lines.transliteration_english: Piram Piaalaa Apiu Peeaaiaa ?15?

Shabad OS B.translation: Gurmukhs remain exhilarated after quaffing the hard to drink the cup of love.

lines.gurmukhi: 16 gurmuK dw jIvx mukq pd

Shabad OS B.translation: Gurmukh,the liberated one in life

lines.gurmukhi: swDsMgiq kir swDnw iprm ipAwlw Ajru jrxw
lines.transliteration_english: Saadhasangati Kari Saadhanaa Piram Piaalaa Ajaru Jaranaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Adopting the discipline in the holy congregation, the unbearable cup of love is drunk and endured.

lines.gurmukhi: pYrI pY pwKwk hoie Awpu gvwie jIvMidAw mrxw
lines.transliteration_english: Pairee Pai Paa Khaaku Hoi Aapu Gavaai Jeevandiaan Maranaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Then the individual falling at the feet and eschewing ego dies in relation to all the worldly concerns.

lines.gurmukhi: jIvx mukiq vKwxIAY mir mir jIvxu fuib fuib qrxw
lines.transliteration_english: Jeevan Moukati Vakhaaneeai Mari Mari Jeevanu Doubi Doubi Taranaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Liberated in life is he who dies of maya and lives up in the love of God.

lines.gurmukhi: sbdu suriq ilvlIxu hoie AipE pIAxu qY Aaucr crxw
lines.transliteration_english: Sabadu Surati Livaleenu Hoi Apiu Peeanu Tai Aouchar Charanaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Merging his consciousness in Word and quaffing the nectar he eats up his ego.

lines.gurmukhi: Anhd nwd Avys kir AMmiRq vwxI inJru Jrxw
lines.transliteration_english: Anahad Naad Avays Kari Anmrit Vaanee Nijharu Jharanaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Inspired by the unstruck melody he always goes on pouring the word-nectar.

lines.gurmukhi: krx kwrx smrQ hoie kwrxu krx n kwrx krxw
lines.transliteration_english: Karan Kaaran Samaradu Hoi Kaaranu Karanu N Kaaranu Karanaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Now he is already cause of all the causes but still does nothing harmful to others.

lines.gurmukhi: piqq auDwrx Asrx srxw ]16]
lines.transliteration_english: Patit Udhaaran Asaran Saranaa ?16?

Shabad OS B.translation: Such a person salvages the sinners and provides shelter to the shelterless.

lines.gurmukhi: 17 gurmuK dw qrnw qwrnw

Shabad OS B.translation: Remaining detached and suffering a lot the gurmukh does good to others

lines.gurmukhi: gurmuiK BY ivic jMmxw BY ivic rihxw BY ivic clxw
lines.transliteration_english: Guramoukhi Bhai Vichi Janmanaa Bhai Vichi Rahinaa Bhai Vichi Chalanaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: The gurmukhs take birth in the divine will, they remain in the divine will and move in the divine will.

lines.gurmukhi: swDsMgiq BY Bwie ivic Bgiq vClu kir AClu Clxw
lines.transliteration_english: Saadhasangati Bhai Bhaai Vichi Bhagati Vachhalu Kari Achhalu Chhalanaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: In the discipline and love of the holy congregation they fascinate the Lord God also.

lines.gurmukhi: jl ivic kvlu Ailpq hoie Aws inrws vlyvY vlxw
lines.transliteration_english: Jal Vichi Kavalu Alipat Hoi Aas Niraas Valayvai Valanaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Being detached like lotus in the water they remain away from the cycle of hopes and disappointments.

lines.gurmukhi: Ahrix Gx hIry jugiq gurmiq inhclu Atlu n tlxw
lines.transliteration_english: Aharani Ghan Heeray Jougati Guramati Nihachalu Atalu N Talanaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: They remain steadfast like a diamond in between the hammer and the anvil and live their life deeply rooted in the wisdom of the Guru (gurmati).

lines.gurmukhi: praupkwr vIcwir ivic jIA dYAw mom vwNgI Flxw
lines.transliteration_english: Paraoupakaar Veechaari Vichi Jeea Daiaa Mom Vaangee Dphalanaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: They always imbibe altruism in their heart and in the sphere of compassion they melt like wax.

lines.gurmukhi: cwir vrn qMbol rsu Awpu gvwie rlwieAw rlxw
lines.transliteration_english: Chaari Varan Tanbol Rasu Aapu Gavaai Ralaaiaa Ralanaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: As four items mix up in betel and become one, likewise the gurmukhs get adjusted with every one.

lines.gurmukhi: vtI qylu dIvw hoie blxw ]17]
lines.transliteration_english: Vatee Taylu Deevaa Hoi Balanaa ?17?

Shabad OS B.translation: They, in the form of lamp becoming wick and oil, burn themselves (for lighting others).

lines.gurmukhi: 18 gurmuKwN dI mukqI dI jugiq

Shabad OS B.translation: The pleasure-fruit of the gurmukhs and its grandeur

lines.gurmukhi: squ sMqoKu dieAw Drmu ArQ kroiV n EVku jwxY
lines.transliteration_english: Satu Santokhu Daiaa Dharamu Arad Karorhi N Aorhaku Jaanai.

Shabad OS B.translation: Crores of properties such as truth, contentment, pity, dharma, lucre are there but none could know the extremity of that (pleasure-fruit).

lines.gurmukhi: cwir pdwrQ AwKIAin hoie lKUix n plu prvwxY
lines.transliteration_english: Chaar Padaarad Aakheeani Hoi Lakhooni N Palu Paravaanai.

Shabad OS B.translation: Four ideals are said to be and may be they are multiplied by lakhs, even then they do not equal the one moment of pleasure fruit.

lines.gurmukhi: irDI isDI lK lK iniD inDwn lK iqlu n qulwxY
lines.transliteration_english: Ridhee Sidhee Lakh Lakh Nidhi Nidhaan Lakh Tilu N Tulaanai.

Shabad OS B.translation: Riddhis, Siddhis and lakhs of treasures do not equal its one small fraction.

lines.gurmukhi: drsn diRsit sMjog lK sbd suriq ilv lK hYrwxY
lines.transliteration_english: Darasan Drisati Sanjog Lakh Sabad Surati Liv Lakh Hairaanai.

Shabad OS B.translation: Seeing the intimacy of Word and the consciousness, many combinations of philosophies and meditations are surprised.

lines.gurmukhi: igAwn iDAwn ismrx AsMK Bgiq jugiq lKnyq vKwxY
lines.transliteration_english: Giaan Dhiaan Simaran Asankh Bhagati Jougati Lakh Nayt Vakhaanai.

Shabad OS B.translation: Many methods of knowledge, meditation and remembrance are put forth;

lines.gurmukhi: iprm ipAwlw shij Gru gurmuiK suKPl coj ivfwxY
lines.transliteration_english: Piram Piaalaa Sahaji Gharu Guramoukhi Soukh Phal Choj Vidaanai.

Shabad OS B.translation: But reaching the tranquil stage, the pleasure-fruit of the cup of love of the Lord attained by gurmukhs is wondrous.

lines.gurmukhi: miq buiD suiD lK myl imlwxY ]18]
lines.transliteration_english: Mati Budhi Sudhi Lakh Mayli Milaanai ?18?

Shabad OS B.translation: At this stage, intellect, wisdom and millions of purities get combined.

lines.gurmukhi: 19 s`c sRySt Awcwr hY

Shabad OS B.translation: Truthfulness is the best conduct

lines.gurmukhi: jp qp sMjm lK lK hom jg neIvyd kroVI
lines.transliteration_english: Jap Tap Sanjam Lakh Lakh Hom Jag Naeevayd Karorhee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Millions of rituals of recitation, penances, continence, burnt offerings and crores of oblations are there.

lines.gurmukhi: vrq nym sMjm Gxy krm Drm lK qMdu mroVI
lines.transliteration_english: Varat Naym Sanjam Ghanay Karam Dharam Lakh Tandu Marorhee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Fasts, rules, controls, activities are many but they all are like a weak thread.

lines.gurmukhi: qIrQ purb sMjog lK puMn dwnu aupkwr n EVI
lines.transliteration_english: Teerad Purab Sanjog Lakh Pounn Daanu Oupakaar N Aorhee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Many are pilgrimage centres, anniversaries, and millions of virtuous acts, charities and altruism's.

lines.gurmukhi: dyvI dyv sryvxy vr srwp lK joV ivCoVI
lines.transliteration_english: Dayvee Dayv Sarayvanay Var Saraap Lakh Jorh Vichhorhee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Millions kinds of worship of gods and goddesses, combinations, detractions, boons, curses are there.

lines.gurmukhi: drsn vrn Avrn lK pUjw Arcw bMDn qoVI
lines.transliteration_english: Darasan Varan Avaran Lakh Poojaa Arachaa Bandhan Torhee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Many philosophies, varnas, non-varnas and many are the persons who do not bother about the (unnecessary) brands of lakhs of worships and oblations.

lines.gurmukhi: lok vyd gux igAwn lK jog Bog lK JwiV pCoVI
lines.transliteration_english: Lok Vayd Goun Giaan Lakh Jog Bhog Lakh Jhaarhi Pachhorhee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Many are the means of public behaviour, virtues, renunciation, indulgence and other covering devices;

lines.gurmukhi: schu ErY sB ikhu lK isAwxp s`Bw QoVI
lines.transliteration_english: Sachahu Aorai Sabh Kihu Lakh Siaanap Sabhaa Dorhee.

Shabad OS B.translation: But all these are craftsmanship's remain away from the truth; they cannot touch it.

lines.gurmukhi: aupir scu Acwru cmoVI ]19]
lines.transliteration_english: Oupari Sachu Achaaru Chamorhee ?19?

Shabad OS B.translation: Higher than truth is truthful living.

lines.gurmukhi: 20 s`cw rwj

Shabad OS B.translation: The true kingdom

lines.gurmukhi: siqgur scw pwiqswhu swDsMgiq sc qKqu suhylw
lines.transliteration_english: Satigur Sachaa Paatisaahu Saadhasangati Sachu Takhatu Suhaylaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: The true Guru (God) is the true emperor and the holy congregation is true throne which is most delightful.

lines.gurmukhi: sc sbdu tkswl scu AstDwqu iek pwrs mylw
lines.transliteration_english: Sachu Sabadu Takasaal Sachu Asat Dhaatu Ik Paaras Maylaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: The true Word is such a true mint where different castes in the from of metals meet the Guru, the philosopher's stone, and become gold (gurmukhs).

lines.gurmukhi: scw Aibclu rwju hY scu mhlu nvhwxu nvylw
lines.transliteration_english: Sachaa Abichal Raaj Hai Sach Mahal Navahaan Navaylaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: There, only the true divine Will operates because the order of truth alone is bestower of joy and delight.

lines.gurmukhi: scw hukmu vrqdw scw Amru sco rs kylw
lines.transliteration_english: Sachaa Houkamu Varatadaa Sachaa Amaru Sacho Ras Kaylaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: There, only the true divine Will operates because the order of truth alone is bestower of joy and delight.

lines.gurmukhi: scI isPiq slwh scu scu slwhxu AMmiRq vylw
lines.transliteration_english: Sachee Sidhatee Salaah Sachu Sachu Salaahoun Anmrit Vaylaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: There, in the early morning eulogisation is true and is of the truth alone.

lines.gurmukhi: scw gurmuiK pMQu hY scu aupdysu n grib ghylw
lines.transliteration_english: Sachaa Guramoukhi Pandu Hai Sachu Oupadays N Garabi Gahaylaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: There, in the early morning eulogisation is true and is of the truth alone.

lines.gurmukhi: Awsw ivic inrws giq scw Kylu mylu scu Kylw
lines.transliteration_english: Aasaa Vichi Niraas Gati Sachaa Khaylu Maylu Sachu Khaylaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Gurmukhs remain detached among many hopes and they always play the game of truth.

lines.gurmukhi: gurmuiK isKu gurU gur cylw ]20]
lines.transliteration_english: Guramoukhi Sikhu Guroo Gur Chaylaa ?20?

Shabad OS B.translation: Such gurmukhs become Guru and the Guru becomes their disciple.

lines.gurmukhi: 21 gurmuKwN dI Alypqw

Shabad OS B.translation: Non attachment of the gurmukhs

lines.gurmukhi: gurmuiK haumY prhrY min BwvY KsmY dw Bwxw
lines.transliteration_english: Guramoukhi Haoumai Paraharai Mani Bhaavai Khasamai Daa Bhaanaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Gurmukh repudiates ego and he likes the will of God.

lines.gurmukhi: pYrI pY pwKwk hoie drgh pwvY mwxu inmwxw
lines.transliteration_english: Pairee Pai Paa Khaak Hoi Daragah Paavai Maanu Nimaanaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Becoming humble and falling at the feet he becomes dust and earns honour in the court of the Lord.

lines.gurmukhi: vrqmwn ivic vrqdw hovxhwr soeI prvwxw
lines.transliteration_english: Varatamaan Vichi Varatadaa Hovanahaar Soee Paravaanaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: He always moves in the present i.e. never ignores the contemporary situations and side by side accepts whatever is likely to happen.

lines.gurmukhi: kwrxu krqw jo krY isir Dir mMin krY sukrwxw
lines.transliteration_english: Kaaranu Karataa Jo Karai Siri Dhari Manni Karai Soukaraanaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Whatever is done by the creator of all the causes, is gratefully accepted by him.

lines.gurmukhi: rwjI hoie rjwie ivic dunIAwN AMdir ijau imhmwxw
lines.transliteration_english: Raajee Hoi Rajaai Vichi Douneeaan Andari Jiu Mihamaanaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: He remains happy in the will of the Lord and considers himself a guest in the world.

lines.gurmukhi: ivsmwdI ivsmwd ivic kudriq kwdr no kurbwxw
lines.transliteration_english: Visamaadee Visamaad Vichi Kudarati Kaadar No Kurabaanaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: He remains elated in the love of the Lord and goes sacrificed unto the feats of the creator.

lines.gurmukhi: lyp Alyp sdw inrbwxw ]21]
lines.transliteration_english: Layp Alayp Sadaa Nirabaanaa ?21?

Shabad OS B.translation: Living in the world he remains detached and liberated.

lines.gurmukhi: 22 bMdy ivKy

Shabad OS B.translation: The obedient person always in obedience

lines.gurmukhi: hukmI bMdw hoie kY swihbu dy hukmY ivic rhxw
lines.transliteration_english: Houkamee Bandaa Hoi Kai Saahibu Day Houkamai Vichi Rahanaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: One should remain in the will of the Lord by becoming an obedient servant.

lines.gurmukhi: hukmY AMdir sB ko sBnw Awvtx hY shxw
lines.transliteration_english: Houkamai Andari Sabh Ko Sabhanaa Aavatan Hai Sahanaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: All are in His will and all have to bear the heat of the divine order.

lines.gurmukhi: idlu drIAwau smwau kir grbu gvwie grIbI vhxw
lines.transliteration_english: Dilu Dareeaau Samaau Kari Garabu Gavaai Gareebee Vahanaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Man should make his heart a river and let the water of humility flow into it.

lines.gurmukhi: vIh iekIh aulMiG kY swDsMgiq isMGwsix bhxw
lines.transliteration_english: Veeh Ikeeh Ulaghi Kai Saadhasangati Singhaasani Bahanaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Leaving the worldly activities one should sit on the throne of holy congregation.

lines.gurmukhi: sbd suriq ilvlIx hoie AnBau AGV GVwey ghxw
lines.transliteration_english: Sabadu Surati Livaleenu Hoi Anabhau Agharh Gharhaaay Gahanaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Merging consciousness in the Word, one should get the ornament of fearlessness prepared.

lines.gurmukhi: isdk sbUrI swbqw swkru sukir n dyxw lhxw
lines.transliteration_english: Sidak Sabooree Saabataa Saakaru Soukari N Daynaa Lahanaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: One should remain true in faith and contentment; the transaction of thankfulness should be kept to continue and one should remain away from worldly give and take.

lines.gurmukhi: nIir n fubxu Aig n dhxw ]22]
lines.transliteration_english: Neeri N Doubanu Agi N Dahanaa ?22?

Shabad OS B.translation: Such a person neither drowns in water (of maya) nor gets burnt in the fire (of desire).

lines.gurmukhi: 23 gurU Aqy is`K dI pRIqI

Shabad OS B.translation: Love between the Guru and the disiple

lines.gurmukhi: imhr muhbiq AwskI iesku musku ikau lukY lukwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Mihar Muhabati Aasakee Isaku Mousaku Kiu Loukai Loukaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Kindness, affection, passionate love and smell do not remain concealed even if they are hidden and of their own get manifested.

lines.gurmukhi: cMdn vws vxwspiq hoie sugMDu n Awpu gxwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Chandan Vaasu Vanaasapati Hoi Sougandhu N Aapu Ganaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Sandal makes the whole vegetation fragrant and never makes it self noticed (but still people come to know that).

lines.gurmukhi: ndIAw nwly gMg imil hoie pivqu n AwiK suxwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Nadeeaan Naalay Gang Mili Hoi Pavitu N Aakhi Sounaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Rivers and streams meet the Ganges and silently become pure without any announcement.

lines.gurmukhi: hIry hIrw byiDAw AxI kxI hoie irdY smwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Heeray Heeraa Baydhiaa Anee Kanee Hoi Ridai Samaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: The diamond is cut by the diamond and the cutter diamond looks as if it has adopted the other diamond in its heart (likewise the Guru also cutting the mind of disciple gives place to him in his own heart).

lines.gurmukhi: swDsMgiq imil swD hoie pwrs imil pwrs hoie AwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Saadhasangati Mili Saadh Hoi Paaras Mili Paaras Hoi Aaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: The disciple of the Guru becomes such a sadhu in the holy congregation as if someone becomes philosopher's stone after touching the philosopher's stone.

lines.gurmukhi: inhcau inhclu gurmqI Bgiq vClu hoie AClu ClwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Nihachau Nihachalu Guramatee Bhagati Vachhalu Hoi Achhalu Chhalaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: With the steadfast teaching of the Guru, the mind of the Sikh becomes peaceful and God also becoming affectionate towards the devotee gets deluded.

lines.gurmukhi: gurmuiK suK Plu AlKu lKwieAw ]23]18]
lines.transliteration_english: Guramoukhi Soukh Phalu Alakhu Lakhaaiaa ?23?18?atdaaraan?

Shabad OS B.translation: Getting a sight of the imperceptible Lord is the pleasure-fruit for the gurmukhs.

lines.gurmukhi: <> siqgur pRswid ]
lines.transliteration_english: Ikonkaar Satigur Prasaadi ?

Shabad OS B.translation: One Oankar, the primal energy, realized through the grace of divine preceptor

lines.gurmukhi: drs iDAwn idib diRsit pRgws BeI krunw ktwC idib dyh prvwn hY
lines.transliteration_english: Daras Dhiaan Dibi Drisati Pragaas Bhaee , Karounaa Kataachh Dibi Dayh Paravaan Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Focusing mind on the form of True Guru, one is enlightened with celestial vision of knowledge. By the grace of True Guru, the human form acquires Godly refulgence making its coming to this world a success.

lines.gurmukhi: sbd suriq ilv bjr kpwt Kuly pRym rs rsnw kY AMmiRq inDwn hY
lines.transliteration_english: Sabad Surati Liv Bajar Kapaat Khulay , Praym Ras Rasanaa Kai Anmrit Nidhaan Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Concentrating the mind on the divine word, the rock strong doors of ignorance become ajar. The acquisition of knowledge then blesses one with the treasure of Lord's name.

lines.gurmukhi: crn kml mkrMd bwsnw subws hsq pUjw pRnwm sPl su igAwn hY
lines.transliteration_english: Charan Kamal Makarand Baasanaa Soubaasa , Hasat Poojaa Pranaam Sadhal Su Giaan Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: The touching and feeling of the dust of True Guru's feet enlivens the fragrance of Lord's name in the mind. Involving the hands in His prayer and service, one is blessed with true and real spiritual knowledge.

lines.gurmukhi: AMg AMg ibsm sRbMg mY smwie Bey mn mnsw Qkq bHm iDAwn hY ]18]
lines.transliteration_english: Ang Ang Bisam Srabang Mai Samaai Bhaay , Man Manasaa Dakat Braham Dhiaan Hai ?18?

Shabad OS B.translation: Thus every hair of a person becomes glorious and he merges with the light divine. All his vices and desires end and his mind dwells in the love of Lord's feet. (18)
